cheatsheet.title: Creation of a Side-by-Side Chart and Listing Report

intro.description: This tutorial helps you create a side-by-side chart and listing report using BIRT.

item.title: Create a Data Source
item.description:
In the Data Explorer view, right-click Data Sources and choose New Data Source.
- On New Data Source, Classic Models Inc. Sample Database is selected. Choose Next.
- Choose Finish.

item.title: Create a Data Set
item.description:
- In the Data Explorer view, right-click Data Sets and choose New Data Set.
- On New Data Set, choose Next.
- On Query, in Available Items, expand one or more tables in the ClassicModels database.
- To create a SQL query, drag column names from Available Items to the right pane to write the SELECT and FROM clauses. Then, choose Finish.
- On Edit Data Set, select Preview Results. Then, choose OK.

item.title: Bind the data to the list
item.description:
- In the layout editor, right-click the List tab and choose Edit Data Binding.
- On Data Binding, specify the data set to which the list binds. Then, choose OK.

item.title: Edit the list group
item.description:
- In the layout editor, select the list element, then right-click and choose Edit Group.
- On Edit Group, specify the group details. Then, choose OK.

item.title: Edit the data item in the group header
item.description:
- Double-click the data item to enable editing.
- Double-click again to specify the values to display in the data item.
- On New Data Binding, type a name, select a data type, and use the expression builder to set up the data to display. Then, choose OK.

item.title: Edit the chart
item.description:
- Double-click the chart to enable editing.
- Double-click again to edit its properties.
- Use the chart wizard to select a chart type, set up the data to display, and format the chart. Then, choose Finish.

item.title: Edit the table
item.description:
- Double-click the table to enable editing.
- Drag fields from the data set in the Data Explorer to the table.
